fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Mori is the spirit of the forest. At any one point of the game select a player to be enclosed in the forest at night. No actions can happen upon them but in return they must give all their voting power to Mori and reports for the night. (they will not be notified)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If the player enclosed in the forest is lynched the following day, Mori will self enclose themselves and lose their voting for one day and their ability permanently.
